name: 1.8: "Truce or Consequences" Trivia Quiz | 'Cheers'- Season 1 | 10 Questions

questions.text: Why couldn't Coach drive straight home?
options: He had too much to drink.
questions.explanation:
He didn't know how.

	Coach always drove someone who had too much to drink to their house then went home. However, in the cold opening of this episode, everyone was sober and could drive themselves. Coach had never driven straight home and did not know how to do it.

questions.text: Complete this line that Diane told Sam. "Unchecked rage is like a festering _______".
questions.explanation:
wound.

	Diane often used quotes and big words. Carla responded by saying the night should be full of laughs.

questions.text: What did Sam say he didn't have?
questions.explanation:
life insurance.

	Carla and Diane decided to stay after closing at Cheers to discuss their problems. Sam was not thrilled about this idea and thought something would happen to his bar. As he was leaving he said to Diane, "I have no life insurance, just this place."

questions.text: What was the drink that Carla made for her and Diane?
options: A big ol' glass of brewsky
questions.explanation:
Leap into an open grave.

	Carla told Diane that it was an old family recipe. She didn't say what was in it but we saw her mix all sorts of various liquors.

questions.text: How did Carla say her Uncle Joe stumbled upon the family drink that she made?
questions.correct: He was making a car bomb.
options: He did very careful scientific experiments.
He was drunk and just mixing stuff.
He stole the recipe from another bar
questions.explanation:
He was making a car bomb.

	Carla often talked about her family doing illegal things. She herself was in a school for wayward girls.

questions.text: What was the most of the drink that Carla made that anyone in Carla's family had been able to successfully have?
questions.explanation:
43.

	Carla told Diane, "No one in my family has ever lived past 43." Diane must have drank more than that because later Carla told her, "You're gonna die."

questions.text: What lie did Carla tell Diane?
questions.correct: That Sam was the father of Gino
options: That Coach was the father of Gino
That Norm was the father of Gino
That Cliff was the father of Gino
questions.explanation:
That Sam was the father of Gino.

	Carla got sick of Diane so she made up the biggest lie she could. Diane didn't find out the truth until she talked to Coach.

questions.text: What did Diane call Carla when Carla told her the lie?
questions.explanation:
"plucky little soldier".

	Carla said she didn't blame Sam for anything. She told Diane that Sam always helped out. Diane told her that may be true but she was the one who bore the baby.

questions.text: What song did Diane sing right before she passed out?
questions.explanation:
People.

	Diane and Carla hugged and Diane started to sing. While singing she passed out on Carla. Carla commenter that she "likes somebody who knows when she's had enough."

questions.text: How did Sam describe Carla's children?
questions.explanation:
"chainsaws with feet".

	Diane then asked specifically about Gino. Sam didn't have any idea which one Gino was.
